title: My-Day
name: myday
description: Using React, Redux, Node.js, Express & MongoDB I have build a task management application called 'My-Day' clone of 'Monday'

title: Airbnb
name: airbnb
description: End to end responsive application built with Angular, Node.js, Express & MongoDB. The app is a clone of Airbnb, it includes a map, advanced search, user authentication, i18n and more.

title: Mister Bitcoin
name: bitcoin
description: Using Angular, Rxjs, TypeScript, I have build bitcoin demo app called 'Mister Bitcoin', the app includes demo contacts to transform coins and statistics graphs.
